God is not pleased with the men who have composed the school board. They should have worked in a way altogether different from what they have done. The God of heaven is weighing these men in scales that are accurate. He has signified that His name is dishonored, that different men must compose the board. Two or three or four men are not enough.  The Lord calls for men who will work in an altogether different way, with an altogether 


                                  -280- 

different spirit, who will respect one another, who will not condemn, who will respect position and intelligence, and will give place and room for others.
